description.narrative: Pacific Island Country Governments have strengthened institutional frameworks for equitable & sustainable water, sanitation and hygiene services, particularly in target countries., which contributes to Sanitation, Social Protection, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, more Pacific children and their families, particularly the most vulnerable, are accessing adequate, equitable, affordable drinking water, sanitation and hygiene.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Pacific Island Country Governments have strengthened institutional frameworks for equitable & sustainable water, sanitation and hygiene services, particularly in target countries.

description.narrative: FUNICEF Pacific continued to provide PICTs with support to strengthen institutional frameworks for equitable and sustainable WASH services. Highlights include identifying an innovative financing mechanism in Kiribati and introducing centralized WASH SDG monitoring databases in Fiji and Vanuatu. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
